text: Petrogradets () was a Russian professional cycling team, which competed in elite road bicycle racing events such as the UCI Women's Road World Cup.http://www.cqranking.com/women/asp/gen/team.asp?year=2009&teamcode;=PTG For the 2010 season, the team merged with Fenixs.http://www.cqranking.com/women/asp/gen/team.asp?year=2009&teamcode;=FEN ==Major wins== ;2008 :Stage 5 Gracia–Orlova, Alexandra Burchenkova :Stage 2 Wyscig Etapowy–Zamosc, Alexandra Burchenkova ;2009 :20px Overall Tour de Feminin - O cenu Ceskeho Svycarska, Alexandra Burchenkova ::Stages 1 & 3 (ITT), Alexandra Burchenkova ::Stages 4 & 5, Elena Novikova ==National and continental champions== ;2009 :20px Kazakhstan Time Trial, Mariya Slokotovich :20px Russia Road Race, Yulia Iliynikh ==References== Category:Defunct cycling teams based in Russia Category:UCI Women's Teams Category:Cycling teams established in 2008 Category:Cycling teams disestablished in 2009 Category:2008 establishments in Russia Category:2009 disestablishments in Russia
title: Petrogradets
